FrageText.de: Sie überholen ein Fahrzeug. Darf dieses beschleunigen?
FrageText.en: You are overtaking a vehicle. Is the vehicle permitted to accelerate?
FrageText.hr: Pretječete vozilo. Smije li ono ubrzavati?
FrageText.sl: Prehitevate vozilo. Sme to vozilo pospešiti?
FrageText.tr: Bir aracı solluyorsunuz. Bu araç hızını arttırabilir mi?

en.Text: Yes, but only if it is a rail vehicle
Not if it is a motor vehicle
Yes, but only if it is a bicycle

hr.Text: Da, ali samo vozilo na tračnicama
